text: Anthony Paul Beke (born 20 July 1966), known professionally as Anton Du Beke, is a British ballroom and Latin dancer and television presenter. He was a professional dancer from 20042020, and as a judge from 2020 onwards on the BBC One celebrity dancing show Strictly Come Dancing. His professional dancer partner since 1997 was Erin Boag. Du Beke was also a former presenter on This Morning. In 2009, he presented the BBC UK version of Hole in the Wall, replacing Dale Winton after being a team captain in 2008. In November 2017, Du Beke released his debut studio album, From the Top, on Polydor Records. It reached number 21 on the UK Albums Chart. In October 2022, he won for the BBC One celebrity dancing show Strictly Come Dancing the National Television Awards trophy. Du Beke was born in Sevenoaks, Kent. title: Anton Du Beke
